name: Wild Legion
description:
Wilderness Calls!

Embark on an epic adventure in the wilderness, where you'll brandish an arsenal of unique weapons, clash with hordes of formidable enemies, and amass precious materials and gold coins.




Gather wood to Build mighty Towers that will serve as your last line of defense. Use more wood to upgrade or repair towers. Or craft many bombs to BOOM enemies out of existence


Gold coins = EXP.
Kill enemies to get coins to level up and buy stats, weapons, or buffs. Wield multiple weapons — melee, ranged, and magic. Upgrade weapons and spells to MAX and buy related BUFF to unlock S-Rank synergies.



Gather resources by DAY, when orcs target you. Protect the Moon Tower by NIGHT from the 4-side siege. During the day more resources appear, and orcs only target you. But during the night when the Moon Tower rises, orcs attack it and you need to build protective towers around it!


Take the lost animal running in circles to the teleport to escape the orc invasion. In return, they will grant you special gifts!



Kill Bosses and elites to get a chance to receive gems. Then spend gems to increase your stats OR buy new towers.

We took big inspiration from Brotato, Noobs want to live, and Don't Starve. If you like the results of our efforts, please wishlist the game!
[url]We are always available on Discord

*Wild Legion es parte de Erabit's Bud Scheme, un espacio para la creatividad de juegos y desarrolladores en solitario/equipos pequeños para prosperar.
